name: Dancer Makeover & Dressup
description:
This girl is a very talented salsa dancer, she has all the right moves, but to really get a high score in the ballroom dancing competitions, she has to also have the looks to match.
Help her out with a beauty facial makeover that will make her skin glow of health.
Use cleanser, scrub, face and eye mask, pop out the zits and give the eyebrows a beautiful shape.
Then move on to the make up part and choose carefully so all her features are correctly emphasized.
The make up should be colorful and fun, just like salsa is.
Then dress her up in fabulous, but comfortable stage dress, or mix and match a top and a bottom.
You should really go for ruffles, animal prints, glitter and a lot of colors.
The shoes have to be special dancing shoes, with just a little bit of heel. Have fun!
